New Records: Josh Hart had 23 points, 15 rebounds and 10 assists for his third triple-double of the season
Key Match Events: New York’s OG Anunoby hit two 3-pointers to break a 63-all tie with 9 minutes to play in the third quarter
Washington rookie guard Bub Carrington fell backward while guarding a player and hit a Knicks player’s knee and then the back of his head on the court
Pre-Game Insights: The Wizards played their second straight game without leading scorer Jordan Poole, who’s out with a bruised left hip
Kyle Kuzma returned after missing 12 games with a strained left rib
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks (23-10) outlasted the Wizards 126-106 on Monday night for their eighth straight victory
The Wizards held the lead for much of the game before losing in overtime on Saturday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks outrebounded the Wizards 54-46, with Hart and Towns combining for 28
The Knicks host Utah on Wednesday while the Wizards host Chicago on Wednesday
Others: Bub Carrington left in a wheelchair, covering his face and did not return with a post-traumatic headache
